mapper.select:
select us.user_code as cusCode, us.user_name as cusName, us.user_acco as cusAccount, us.sex, us.phone, us.email, us.idcard, us.user_img as cusImg, cus.inv_code as invCode, us.version from t_sys_user us left join t_sys_customer cus on (us.user_code = cus.cus_code) where us.is_delete = 0 and us.role = 3
AND us.user_acco like concat ('%',#{cusAccount},'%')
AND us.user_name like concat ('%',#{cusName},'%')
AND cus.inv_code in (select inv_code from t_sys_store where user_code = #{operator})
order by us.create_time desc
